document.full_text: canadian pop sensation justin bieber irish rockers u2 are among the artists being featured on a digital-only album being rushed out by universal music to raise funds for japan's earthquake and tsunami victims.
document.title: justin bieber, u2 on new album to aid japan
lines_and_colors: canadian pop sensation justin bieber irish rockers u2 are among the artists being featured on a digital-only album being rushed out by universal music to raise funds for japan's earthquake and tsunami victims.
